Posts.Content: hi everyone. i am new here. i just needed someone to explain to me about my mom's histopathology report.. my mom is 72 y/o and a retired school teacher. Diagnosis says: invasive ductal carcinoma, histologic grade 3 nuclear grade 3 associated with encysted papillary carcinoma, left breast tumor infiltrates underlying skeletal muscle tumor size: 7.5cm in widest diameter no definite lymphovascular or perineural invasion nipple and basal line of resection: free of tumor if somebody can please explain to me and tell me in laymans term what it says will be very much appreciated... im very much concern of my moms condition.. please please help. thanks
Posts.Title: breast cancer
